item.title: Using Kibana with KubeDB Elasticsearch
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. Using Kibana with KubeDB Elasticsearch This tutorial will show you how to connect Kibana with an Elasticsearch cluster deployed with KubeDB. If you don’t know how to use Kibana, please visit here. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster. If you do not already have a cluster, you can create one by using kind.
